comments:
Build 20040226

I've got a test case that is consistently locking up the workbench. The UI doesn't totally freeze, it 
just stops responding to most input. I can still give focus to some of my visible views and perform 
some actions, but most things (like trying to activate a non-visible view) don't work. It happens 
right after I select a stack frame in the Debug view (the LaunchView in the stack trace):

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Feb 26, 2004 12:58:29.418

This appears to be a fast view problem. Jared did you have any fast views or 
not?

I don't have access to the workspace at the moment, but I usually do have some 
fast views.

Somehow the toolbar for the fast view bar is getting disposed before the
workbench window. I've spent some time hunting through the code, and it's not
clear how this might happen.

It's likely that this was fixed sometime in the past year, but without more
information or steps to reproduce, I don't believe it is possible to verify or
investigate further.

Please reopen if this recurs. (...and if you can attach a workspace that
reproduces it, that would be fantastic)
